question: Which of the following UNESCO World Heritage Sites is considered an "Outstanding Contribution to the Modern Movement"?
option1: Architectural Work of Le Corbusier in Chandigarh
option2: Victorian and Art Deco Ensemble of Mumbai
option3: Archaeological Site of Nalanda Mahavihara (Nalanda University)
answer: Architectural Work of Le Corbusier in Chandigarh
explanation: Architectural Work of Le Corbusier in Chandigarh was notified as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2016.
